name: Rowing Race
description:
#WeeklyGameJam
Topic of week 72: 'Finish line'

Hello, try the typical mini racing game but on boats. It has several maps. The first, to reach the goal line avoiding the obstacles in the shortest possible time.
The second, you have to arrive in the shortest time going through the flags (the red ones on the outside, the green ones on the inside) if you make a mistake you will add 10 seconds to the time.
To move, use "ad" or arrows. The boats move that way because I wanted to simulate the movement when you row.
I hope u like.
Any comment is well received.
